https://tmrev.io/movie/359325-Distractions 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8ymipREZx3hhdD28q5DlqqCO81S.jpg Distracted by life, Mr. Makkonen misses his engagement party by decades. From the cradle to the grave, life keeps interrupting, not only him, but a tired mother, a doomed superhero and the rest of the comrades in this uncontrollable world. Mixing comedy and fantasy with dark stories, Distractions will deliver the laughs with strings attached. Distractions
